title: Tuning La-O adsorption sites dispersion via hydrogen bond-capping organic-inorganic copolymerization strategy for enhanced phosphate removal
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00791C, Paper
Feng Xiao, Yongqi Li, Shijie Wang, Jianing Zhang, Jia Hong Pan, Dongqin Yuan, Shuoxun Dong, Yili Wang
The reduction of advanced phosphate (P) levels is crucial for addressing the widespread and severe issue of aquatic eutrophication, which hinges on the development of effective adsorbents. Lanthanum (La)-based materials...
